links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
The Lord of the Rings: The Treason of Isengard

wikitext.*:
'''Pocket Studios''' is a video game developer, specialised in developing Game Boy Advance games. It developed the Game Boy Advance version of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'']] and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Treason of Isengard]]''.
